item.description:
Hi everyone,

Its clearing up and I've decided to take a walk for 1 - 1.5 hours along the Charles River in Waltham. We'll meet in front of Margaritas at 2pm. There is plenty of parking on Pine St and Chestnut. My cell is
508-472-7900. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: be in front my cell is 508-472-7900
item.name: walk today Charles River West in Waltham
